etymology.description: Depicts grain heads growing evenly at the same height -> represents uniformity and equality -> used for 'together'
etymology.interpretation: The character 齊(齊) (qí, "together") was originally a pictogram showing grains at the same level, symbolizing the concept of uniformity and togetherness.

examples.chinese: 我们齐心协力(我們齊心協力)，实现梦想(實現夢想)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen qí xīn xiélì, shíxiàn mèngxiǎng.
examples.english: We work together to achieve our dreams.

examples.chinese: 大家齐聚一堂(大家齊聚一堂)，分享快乐(分享快樂)。
examples.pinyin: Dàjiā qí jù yī táng, fēnxiǎng kuàilè.
examples.english: Everyone gathers together to share happiness.

examples.chinese: 朋友们齐上阵(朋友們齊上陣)，共创辉煌(共創輝煌)。
examples.pinyin: Péngyǒumen qí shàng zhèn, gòng chuàng huīhuáng.
examples.english: Friends join forces together to create brilliance.
